insert into farm_desc (farm_id, title, picture, position, is_deleted, is_faked, created, created_by, updated, updated_by, summary) values (#{farmId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{picture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{position,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT}, #{isFaked,jdbcType=BIT}, #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{summary,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update farm_desc set farm_id = #{farmId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, picture = #{picture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, position = #{position,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT}, is_faked = #{isFaked,jdbcType=BIT}, created = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updated = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_by = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, summary = #{summary,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, farm_id, title, picture, position, is_deleted, is_faked, created, created_by, updated, updated_by, summary from farm_desc where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
